issue.title: [CF 1596] Notifications on stacks changed
issue.body:
Hello!

 

I am trying to make a notification for my aura Sharpened blades aura. I would like the aura to have activation border light up when the stacks reach 29. So far The tracking is waay off. And the lighting does not reset after I use the skill. Anyone knows how to fix this?

 

Here are settings what I use: https://i.imgur.com/cw3h37X.png

 

Thank you in advance! :)

comments.body:
